entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as the one who pointed her wand at the handle and said 'Alohamora'. She is also described as moving over the threshold together with someone else.

entities.name: regulus
entities.description: Regulus's bedroom is being examined by Hermione. He had striven to emphasize his connection to the rest of the family through Slytherin colors and the Black family crest.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius's bedroom is mentioned as having a sense of former grandeur. It is also compared to Regulus's bedroom in terms of size.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is the subject of newspaper cuttings that Hermione examines.

relationships.description: Hermione crosses the room to examine Regulus's collection of newspaper cuttings.
Regulus seems to have been a fan of Voldemort for a few years before he joined the Death Eaters.
